what
> if, for real, ninjas was only a myth? I think it would be funny :D
>

It would be really funny if the shinobi were really just plain old 
samurai, just with specialized training, simmilar to our special 
forces. I think it would also be funny if they used roughly the same  
exact weapons as the samurai, give or take 1 or 2. I would also laugh 
too if they didn't wear black but dressed like the enemy to blend in,  
and not be found out by a guard saying "Who is that in the black 
pajamas with a sword, coming towards us?"

Guard 2: "I don't know, we could just kill him then ask." 

That would be an awesome joke.

Maikeru
